attributes.action: intervene to ensure that the NINE convicted members of the Kingshold Boys are sentenced to a life means life prison sentence, without the opportunity of EVER being released.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: These nine people are dangerous animals and in this country we still keep dangerous animals locked up.

rejection.details: Individual sentences are a matter for the courts, not Government.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
